name: Anti Terrorist: Elite Force Co
description:
Anti Terrorist: Elite Force Combat is the most exciting and challenging first person shooter (FPS) experience, where you play as top class sniper together with your team to strike terrorists, combat covert terrorist activities and destroy terrorist bases.
Game Features:
-realistic and challenging FPS experience
-play as sniper together with elite sniper team to infiltrate terrorist threats
-travel around the world to combat terrorist bases
-numerous missions
-heart-pounding sound effects
-ultra optimized graphics
